text: oh inu anthu okhulupirira! Lapani kwa Mulungu mwachoonadi! Mwina Ambuye wanu angakuchotserani machimo anu ndi kukulowetsani inu m’minda imene pansi pake pamayenda mitsinje. Tsiku limene Mulungu sadzalola kuti Mtumwi ndi iwo amene amamutsatira kuti azunzidwe, nyali yawo idzayaka patsogolo pawo ndi Buku ku dzanja lamanja lawo. Iwo adzati: “Ambuye wathu walitsani nyali yathu ndipo tikhululukireni. Ndithudi inu muli ndi mphamvu pa zinthu zonse.”
